metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13611 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in python-engineio through 3.8.2. There is a Cross-Site WebSocket Hijacking (CSWSH) vulnerability that allows attackers to make WebSocket connections to a server by using a victim's credentials, because the Origin header is not restricted.

criterions.comment: python-engineio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
